control_attributes.Control: AU-9 (2) AUDIT BACKUP ON SEPARATE PHYSICAL SYSTEMS / COMPONENTS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system backs up audit records [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] onto a physically different system or system component than the system or component being audited.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization reviews the open source information sites being monitored [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

Control Statement: The information system backs up audit records [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] onto a physically different system or system component than the system or component being audited.
Control Name: AU-9 (2) AUDIT BACKUP ON SEPARATE PHYSICAL SYSTEMS / COMPONENTS
